name: Teak Slab Table
description: A single slab of rare teak — 10 cm solid — resting on a gold powder-coated steel frame. Every piece is sculpted by nature itself.
detailDescription: This table begins as a single piece of aged teak wood — its organic edges untouched, its grain telling decades of growth. At 10 cm of solid thickness, it carries a quiet authority that transforms any room it enters. The base is matte-black steel, finished with a gold powder coating: a subtle tribute to the golden light of Dubai. No two slabs are alike. What you see is what nature carved.
material: Teak Wood · Steel · Gold Powder Coat

name: Rattan Garden Chair
description: Hand-woven by master artisans from sustainable rattan. A sculptural petal backrest meets all-weather durability — crafted for living.
detailDescription: Woven entirely by hand from sustainable rattan harvested across Southeast Asia, each chair takes over three days to complete. The petal-shaped backrest is both sculpture and function — its open weave channels air, keeping you cool even in the warmest light. Built to withstand sun and rain without losing its warmth, this chair ages beautifully — deepening in tone with each passing season.
